title: Labor Day Sale: Save $439 on this refurbished 9.7″ iPad Pro
content:
Macworld

The words ‘Apple’ and ‘bargain’ are rarely uttered together. But that’s exactly what you’ll do during our Labor Day Sale. Until 11:59 pm on September 4, pick up this awesome refurbished Apple iPad Pro for just $159.97 — A rare opportunity to get one of the best tablets on the market at an unbelievably low price.

This iPad Pro is a great tablet for students, artists, or anyone working in the gig economy. It features a 9.7” Retina display so everything looks vibrant; it has 32GB of storage, and it’s got dual cameras for taking photos and Facetiming. Better still, It has a 10-hour battery which means you’ll be able to use it practically the whole workday without having to recharge.

This is a refurbished unit which means it’s a few years old so it’s unlikely to run the latest apps. It has been, however, professionally inspected, cleaned, and tested to make sure it runs like new. It has, in fact, been given a refurbishment grade of ‘B’. That means that it’s guaranteed to run perfectly with the only caveat being that it may arrive with a cosmetic blemish or two.

More Labor Day Savings: Get Windows 11 Pro.

If you can deal with those minor imperfections that won’t affect functionality, then it’s a great way to save on what many believe to be one of the best tablets that Apple has ever produced. But don’t wait too long — Our Labor Day Sale is only on through September 4, so it’s best to buy now rather than take a chance on missing out.

Get this refurbished Apple iPad Pro for the discounted price of just $159.97, no coupon codes required, until 11:59 pm on September 4.
